subdisciplines.name: Food Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the cultural and social aspects of food production, consumption, and distribution.

subdisciplines.name: Food History
subdisciplines.description: The study of the historical development of food and its role in human society.

subdisciplines.name: Food Policy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the development and implementation of public policies related to food, agriculture, and nutrition.

subdisciplines.name: Food Science
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical, biological, and chemical properties of food, as well as the development of new food products and processes.

subdisciplines.name: Food Systems
subdisciplines.description: The study of the complex relationships between food producers, consumers, and the environment.
